    • Method Detail

      • registerService

        public boolean registerService(java.lang.String serviceName,
                               ServiceFactory serviceFactory,
                               int maxCapacity)
        Registers a service to the lookup table. To register a service the user has to define the service name, the factory used to make instances of the service and the maximum capacity of the service instances.
        Specified by:
        registerService in interface ActiveServiceLookup
        Parameters:
        serviceName - defines what the service is called.
        serviceFactory - the factory used to make instances of the service.
        maxCapacity - defines how many instances of the service are allowed.
        Returns:
        whether the registration was successful or not.

      • getService

        public ServiceMetaData getService(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Returns the ServiceMetaData for a specified service.
        Specified by:
        getService in interface ActiveServiceLookup
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the specified service.
        Returns:
        the meta data of the service.

      • getServiceEnumeration

        public java.util.Enumeration<java.lang.String> getServiceEnumeration()
        Returns an String Enumeration of the keys in the lookup table. The order of the keys will be kept from the lookup table.
        Specified by:
        getServiceEnumeration in interface ActiveServiceLookup
        Returns:
        the keys in the lookup table.

      • getKeySet

        public java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap.KeySetView<java.lang.String,ServiceMetaData> getKeySet()
        Returns the key set in the hash map table. The order of the keys will be unpredictable.
        Specified by:
        getKeySet in interface ActiveServiceLookup
        Returns:
        the key set of the hash map.

      • removeServiceEntry

        public ServiceMetaData removeServiceEntry(java.lang.String service)
        Removes a service entry from the lookup table.
        Specified by:
        removeServiceEntry in interface ActiveServiceLookup
        Parameters:
        service - the service name.
        Returns:
        the meta data about the removed service.
